text: today's customers expect more when they
interact with you you make surprises and
delights and have their experience but
deep personalized engagement will build
the foundation for a long-lasting
relationships with your customers
Amazon's pinpoint is a powerful solution
based service loaded with functionality
and insights web and app analytics
segmentation targeting and multi-channel
engagement across email push SMS voice
and custom channels for meaningful
promotional and transactional engagement
with your customers and Amazon pinpoint
boasts your new secret weapon pinpoint
journeys with pinpoint journeys it's
fast and easy to get up and running just
like this every journey starts with a
trigger from their segment your users
into unique cohorts so that the call to
action resonates clearly and
specifically for each split your users
based on yes or no conditions leverage a
random split or a multivariate split
then add an activity like send an email
add a weight node of any duration time
or a specific date then create a
conditional split such as sending a
follow-up email if the email was open
for an alternative email if it was not
congratulations you've just created a
pinpoint journey no code or technical
expertise needed just drag-and-drop
create any possible journey with any
combination of activities with only a
few clicks and configure on the fly and
Amazon pin point integrates with other
AWS services its global and scalable
Amazon pinpoint powerful flexible and
the fastest way to create a richer
experience for your customers get
started for free at aws.amazon.com slash
pinpoint
